message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection, given its worth of $12,000 to you. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $14,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the value I place on it and the benefit it offers to you. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. Best regards, Alice.
